entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -44.4°C
Wind: N 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
